General.Name: Benfica
General.Description: Sport Lisboa e Benfica - Futebol, SAD operates a sports club in Portugal. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Lisbon, Portugal. Sport Lisboa e Benfica - Futebol, SAD operates as a subsidiary of Sport Lisboa e Benfica SGPS SA.
General.Address: Porta 18 Av. EusEbio da Silva Ferreira, Lisbon, Portugal, 1500-313

AddressData.Street: Porta 18 Av. EusEbio da Silva Ferreira
